question: If a pizza has 12 slices and you eat 1/3 of it, how many slices do you eat?
A class has 30 students. If 1/5 are absent, how many are absent?
A bag contains 18 marbles. If 2/3 are red, how many red marbles are there?
A book has 100 pages. If you read 3/10 of it, how many pages did you read?
A rope is 30 meters long. If you cut off 2/5 of it, how long is the piece you cut?
A box has 24 chocolates. If you eat 1/6 of them, how many are left?
A tank holds 60 liters of water. If it is 3/4 full, how much water is in it?
A salary is $1,200. If 1/3 is spent on rent, how much is spent on rent?
A garden is 40 square meters. If 3/8 is used for vegetables, what area is used?
A bus has 48 seats. If 5/6 are occupied, how many seats are taken?
A packet has 60 candies. If 3/5 are orange, how many are orange?
A school has 200 students. If 2/5 are girls, how many girls are there?
A journey is 90 km long. If you have traveled 2/3 of it, how far have you gone?
A recipe calls for 24 eggs. If you make 3/4 of the recipe, how many eggs do you use?
A field is 80 meters long. If 3/10 of it is fenced, how long is the fenced part?
A library has 300 books. If 1/6 are fiction, how many fiction books are there?
A water tank holds 120 liters. If 5/8 is used, how much is used?
A class has 28 students. If 3/4 are present, how many are present?
A cake weighs 800 grams. If you eat 3/8 of it, how much did you eat?
A farm has 90 chickens. If 2/3 are hens, how many hens are there?
A shop has 150 apples. If 4/5 are sold, how many are sold?
A ribbon is 50 cm long. If you use 2/5 of it, how much do you use?
A park has 120 trees. If 1/4 are oak trees, how many oak trees are there?
A box of pencils has 48 pencils. If 5/8 are used, how many are used?
A concert has 200 tickets. If 3/5 are sold, how many tickets are sold?
A bag of flour weighs 2 kg. If you use 3/4 of it, how much do you use in grams?
A school trip costs $180. If parents pay 2/3 of it, how much do they pay?
A bottle contains 1.5 liters of juice. If you drink 2/3 of it, how much do you drink in milliliters?
A field is 120 meters long. If 5/6 of it is planted, how much is planted?
A packet of seeds has 90 seeds. If 4/9 are planted, how many are planted?
A toy costs $40. If you have saved 3/5 of the amount, how much have you saved?
A swimming pool holds 3000 liters. If it is 2/5 full, how much water is in it?
A basket has 72 fruits. If 5/12 are apples, how many apples are there?
A car travels 240 km. If 3/8 of the journey is on highways, how many km are on highways?
A school has 450 students. If 2/9 are in Grade 6, how many Grade 6 students are there?
A cake recipe uses 600 grams of flour. If you make 2/3 of the recipe, how much flour do you use?
A farm has 120 animals. If 3/8 are cows, how many cows are there?
A book has 240 pages. If you have read 5/6 of it, how many pages have you read?
A tank has 90 liters of oil. If 7/9 is used, how much is used?
A shop sells 180 toys. If 4/15 are sold on Monday, how many are sold on Monday?
A piece of cloth is 60 meters long. If 3/5 is used for curtains, how much is used?
A school choir has 60 members. If 3/10 are boys, how many boys are there?
A watermelon weighs 4 kg. If you eat 3/4 of it, how much do you eat in grams?
A factory produces 200 cars per day. If 7/10 are sedans, how many sedans are produced?
A bag has 80 candies. If 3/16 are mint, how many are mint?
A distance is 120 km. If 5/12 is traveled by train, how many km by train?
A school has 360 students. If 5/12 are girls, how many girls are there?
A box contains 120 chocolates. If 7/15 are dark, how many are dark?
A farmer harvests 300 kg of potatoes. If 2/5 are sold, how many kg are sold?
A library has 480 books. If 3/8 are science books, how many science books are there?
A pizza costs $24. If you pay 3/8 of the cost, how much do you pay?
